user.name: Eliezer Yudkowsky ⏹️
user.description: The original AI alignment person.  Missing punctuation at the end of a sentence means it's humor.  If you're not sure, it's also very likely humor.

fullText: If you know someone who's currently being driven into psychosis by an LLM, please ask them if they're willing to publicly share transcripts, ideally natively-hosted (eg chatgpt's /share).  I'd like to see the raw data, and probably so would some other researchers.
